original_text: Then Jesus told the people another story. He said, ‘This is what the kingdom of heaven is like: A farmer planted some good wheat seeds into his field.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들 앞에 또 비유를 들어 이르시되 천국은 좋은 씨를 제 밭에 뿌린 사람과 같으니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus told the people another story.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 사람들에게 또 다른 이야기를 말씀하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: This is what the kingdom of heaven is like:
A farmer planted some good wheat seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 농부가 좋은 밀 씨앗들을 심었습니다.
